import { Comment } from '@/types';

export const mockComments: Comment[] = [
  {
    id: '1',
    postId: '1',
    userId: '2',
    username: 'mike_foodie',
    userDisplayName: 'Mike Rodriguez',
    profileImage: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=400',
    isVerified: false,
    content: 'This is amazing! Love the vibes here üî•',
    timestamp: '2h',
    likes: 24,
    isLiked: false,
    isAuthorLiked: true,
    isAuthorReply: false,
    replies: [
      {
        id: '1-1',
        postId: '1',

        isVerified: true,
        content: 'Thanks Mike! Glad you enjoyed it! üôè',
        timestamp: '1h 45m',
        likes: 8,
        isLiked: false,
        isAuthorLiked: false,
        isAuthorReply: true,
      },
      {

          duration: 12,

    profileImage: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=400',
    isVerified: true,
    content: 'Thank you all for the love! ‚ù§Ô∏è',
    timestamp: '45m',
    likes: 56,
    isLiked: false,

    replies: [
      {

        content: 'You deserve it! Keep creating! üé®',

      },
